title: Chapionship Shards
body: So what happens if you have extra championship shards after everything is gone on November 6th? are we able to exchange them for essence or something?

replies.body:
The Worlds 2016 event ends on **November 6 at 23:59 PST** and all emotes, recalls and materials related to the event will expire then, as stated on our [2016 Worlds Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
